Module swirlds.platform

Package com.swirlds.platform

Provides the core Swirlds platform.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FastCopyable
    An interface for classes that can be copied and serialized in a way specific to the Swirlds platform.
    SwirldMain
    To implement a swirld, create a class that implements SwirldMain.
    SwirldState
    A Swirld app is defined by creating two classes, one implementing SwirldMain, and the other SwirldState, such that:

    SwirldState has a no-argument constructor (called by Platform) All SwirldState variables are thread-safe and private All SwirldState methods are synchronized SwirldMain never modifies an object in SwirldState
    So, if SwirldState contains an array, and SwirldMain gets it through a getter method, then the developer is responsible for making sure SwirldMain never changes the contents of that array.
    SwirldState.SwirldState2
    Normally, an app must define a state class that implements SwirldState.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Address
    One address in an address book, including all the info about a member.
    AddressBook
    The Address of every known member of the swirld.
    Browser
    The Browser that launches the Platforms that run the apps.
    Console
    A console window.
    CryptoStatistics
    This class collects and reports various statistics about advanced cryptography module operation.
    Event
    This is a single hashgraph event.
    FCDataInputStream
    A drop-in replacement for DataInputStream, which handles FastCopyable classes specially.
    FCDataOutputStream
    A drop-in replacement for DataOutputStream, which handles FastCopyable classes specially.
    Network
    A set of static utility methods for finding all the local IP addresses associated with the local machine, or checking whether a particular address is one of them.
    Platform
    A Swirlds platform, which runs apps, and handles syncing and consensus.
    RandomExtended
    A class similar to Random, but with extra methods to clone it and add entropy, and without thread safety.
    Signature
    Encapsulates a cryptographic signature along with the public key to use during verification.
    Statistics
    This class collects and reports various statistics about network operation.
    Transaction
    A hashgraph transaction that consists of an array of bytes and a list of immutable Signature objects.
    Utilities
    This is a collection of static utility methods, such as for comparing and deep cloning of arrays.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlatformStatus
    The status of the Platform, indicating whether all is normal, or if it has some problem, such as being disconnected, or not having the latest state.
    SignatureType
    The type of cryptographic algorithm used to create a signature.
    VerificationStatus
    An indicator as to whether a Signature is awaiting verification, valid, or invalid.
